Title: Kill the Messenger
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Ingrid Escajeda, Elmore Leonard (short story "Fire in the Hole"), Leonard Chang (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: An attack on Alison sends Raylan to Harlan in search of payback. Boyd scrambles to arrange protection for Ava.
